job_title: Sr.Lead GCP Data Engineer (network telecom BGV)
jd: From: Anusha.vennapusa, w3global anusha.vennapusa@w3global.com Reply to: anusha.vennapusa@w3global.com HiHope you are doing Good **********IMMEDIATE REQUIREMENTS FOR LOCAL TO TX**************1) Job Title: Data Engineer with Scala -Irving, Texas-HybridLocation: Irving, Texas-HybridExperience: 11+Visa: H1-B, H4-EAD, USC.Mandatory skills: GCP Data Engineer with Airflow, Big Query, DataProc, spark, Scala, shellscript, python. 2)Job Title: Data Engineer with Scala -Irving, Texas-HybridLocation: Irving, Texas-HybridExperience: 11+Visa: H1-B, H4-EAD, USC.Mandatory skills: Airflow, Big Query, DataProc, spark, Scala, shellscript, python 3)Job Title: Sr.Lead GCP Data Engineer (network/telecom BGV) -Irving, Texas-Hybrid (Local)Location: Irving, Texas-HybridExperience: 12+Visa: H1-B, H4-EAD, USC.Mandatory skills: GCP stack airflow, BQ, dataproc, spark, HadoopJob Description: Network/telecom background, understanding of telecom network data, GCP stack airflow, BQ, dataproc, spark, Hadoop, should be able to position to manage and guide the team so they can do end to end delivery, understand business requirements, redesigning if needed, and code review. Kind of team lead role with 10+ years’ experience. 4)Job Title: Data Engineer with Java Stream-Irving, Texas-Hybrid (Local)Experience: 11+Visa: H1-B, H4-EAD, USC.Mandatory skills: Java, streaming tech, pub sub, Kafka, Strong SQL, java based apache beam, airflow, HadoopJob Description: Dataflow with Java, streaming tech, pub sub, Kafka, Strong SQL, java based apache beam, airflow, Hadoop ecosystem (secondary pref) NOTE: Don't share Hotlist only share Resumes to anusha.vennapusa@w3global.com
